results.name: a(1) = 1, for n > 1, if n is even, a(n) = A055938(n/2), otherwise a(n) = A005187(a(A064989(n))).
comment: For n > 1, a(n) = the number which is in the same position of array A256997 where n is located in array A246278.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2048
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, if n is even, a(n) = A055938(n/2), otherwise a(n) = A005187(a(A064989(n))).
Other identities: For all n >= 2, a(n) = A256997(A252752(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 10 2016
